document.masterDocTitle: A catalog of Athericidae (Diptera) from Neotropical and Andean Regions

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A catalog of Athericidae (Diptera) from Neotropical and Andean Regions

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type species:
Suragina illucens Walker, 1860
by monotypy.

paragraph.materialsCitation: Holotype : without sex of specimen ( Colezione di Saussure and Bellardi presumably lost?). Distr.: Mexico . Guerrero State ( Omilteme ); México Federal District ; ( Ciudad de México ); Michoacán State ( Angangueo ); Oaxaca State ( Oaxaca ).

Holotype : without sex of specimen ( Colezione di Saussure and Bellardi , presumably lost?). Distr.: Costa Rica . Cartago Province ( Irazu ). México . Chiapas State ( Ocozocoautla ); Chihuahua State ( Samarichie ); México Federal District ( Tenancingo ); Nayarit State ( Tepic ( 24 miles SE); Oaxaca State (Oaxaca, Valle Nacional ); Puebla State ( Teziutlan ( 6 miles NE), ( 5 miles NE), Huauchinango ( 8 miles SW)); Sinaloa State ( Potrerillos ); Veracruz State ( Córdoba , Potrero ( 5 miles NW), Rio Atoyac ); Panama . Chiriqui Province ( Bugaba , Valle de las Minas ).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Syntypes : female ( MTD ). Dist.: Bolivia : Department of La Paz: Larecaja Province ( Mapiri , San Antonio , San Carlos ). Perú : Department of Cusco : Urubamba Province ( Urubamba , Meshagua , Rosalina ); Department of Pasco : Oxapampa Province ( Pichis , Puerto Bermúdez , Puerto Jessup (actually named
Puerto de Yesup
))
.

paragraph.materialsCitation:
Holotype : female Brazil . Roraima State , Serra Pacaraima
27. VIII. 1987
Col. A.L. Henriques ( INPA ). Distr.: Brazil . Roraima State (Serra Pacaraima).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Refs.: Coscarón & Coscarón, 1996: 107 (com.)
Rafael et al . 1997: 499
(com.).
